overview: Sashi Bommakanty is a technology entrepreneur with over 10 years of experience starting technology companies and spearheading product and engineering efforts. Most recently, Sashi co-founded Goowy Media and served as VP of Product Development. Goowy Media raised one round of financing from Mark Cuban, and was later acquired by AOL in 2008. Prior to Goowy, Sashi led engineering efforts at eAssist Global Solutions. eAssist was a leading CRM software provider that was acquired by Talisma Corporation in 2004.
